properties.body:
MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
VESSEL SUFFERED AN EXPLOSION AND FIRE VICINITY
STRAIT OF SICILY (37-10N 012-00E). VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4409, 3906 5908 4527,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
